file(COPY  exclude bug981.cir bug981.cir.sh bug981A.cir bug981B.cir patfile tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug981.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_981_SON/bug981.cir.sh COMMAND bash bug981.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug981.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_981_SON/bug981.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_981_SON/bug981.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;bug981son;valgrind;capacitor")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_981_SON/bug981.cir.sh COMMAND bash bug981.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce>" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug981.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_981_SON/bug981.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_981_SON/bug981.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;bug981son;valgrind;capacitor")
endif()
